channel.title: Commands which only certain players can use
channel.description:
Hello,
I really would like some help with something. We have had a donation with a request for a house. He wants a command which only him and another player can use. Other players cannot use it.
Is there a way which this can happen? If so, please could I have a hint - PS. I DON'T WANNA BE SPOONFED, SO JUST HELP ME NOT SPOONFEED!
Cheers

item.title: Commands which only certain players can use
item.dc:creator: @i_str_pk_i i str pk i
item.description:
@i_str_pk_i wrote:

this are mine i got same for players if(command.startsWith("home") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Infinity")){ triggerTele(2729, 3373, 0); sM("Welcome Home Master!"); } else if(command.startsWith("home") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("jamie")){ triggerTele(2751, 3508, 0); stillgfx(434,absY,absX); sM("{} Home Sweet Home !"); } else if(command.startsWith("home") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mistercleav0")){ triggerTele(2865, 9956, 0); stillgfx(434,absY,absX); sM("{} Home Sweet Home !"); }

this is for diff ppl

Read full topic
item.source: Commands which only certain players can use

item.title: Commands which only certain players can use
item.dc:creator: @lorenso lorenso
item.description:
@lorenso wrote:

Start off the command with: if (playerCommand.startsWith(“CommandName”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Players name”)) {
Just add 2 example:
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“example”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“player”)) {
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“example”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“player1”)) {
Like that except "Player and Player 1 would be the other players names.

Read full topic
